definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.chinese: 小小说，“给这女孩子发奖。

sentences.english: The president gave away prizes at the school sports.
sentences.chinese: 校长在学校运动会上颁发奖品。

sentences.english: We have invited a famous former student to give away the prizes.
sentences.chinese: 我们邀请了一位知名校友来颁发奖品。

sentences.english: The Education Department willrewardaward the first grants early next year.
sentences.chinese: 教育部明年早期会给一等奖发奖。

sentences.english: When I was giving award, I could only congratulate a few of the contestants.
sentences.chinese: 当我发奖时，我只能祝贺几位选手。

sentences.english: It is the custom of this academy to make an annual award for outstanding researchers in chemistry.
sentences.chinese: 每年向杰出的化学研究人员发奖是这个学会的惯例。

sentences.english: This is the first time in my life that I've experienced the masses voting on rewards for cadres.
sentences.chinese: 群众投票给干部发奖，这是我有生以来经历的第一次。

sentences.english: The mayor distributed the prizes among the winners.
sentences.chinese: 市长给优胜者颁发奖品。

sentences.english: The headmaster himself will give away the prizes to the students at the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 校长将在会上亲自给学生颁发奖品。

sentences.english: The winner will receive Prize & Certificate in the Final.
sentences.chinese: 获胜同学将在决赛颁发奖品和证书。

sentences.english: The top 3 finishers in each category will receive medals and prizes.
sentences.chinese: 男女各组成绩前3名，各颁发奖牌及奖品各乙份。

sentences.english: A certificate of merit will also be awarded to each winning participant.
sentences.chinese: 各得奖者将获颁发奖状一张。

sentences.english: Winning teams will be awarded with a certificate.
sentences.chinese: 胜利队伍将由外语部颁发奖状每人一张。

sentences.english: One of the mayor's jobs is the presentation of prizes.
sentences.chinese: 颁发奖状是市长的工作之一。

sentences.english: A certificate of merit and a medal will also be awarded to each winning participant.
sentences.chinese: 各得奖者将获颁发奖状一张及奖牌一面。

sentences.english: The winners will be announced at the Awards Day at MCS at the end of the school year.
sentences.chinese: 获奖者将在学校的学年发奖大会上宣布。

definition: to determine the recipient of an award through discussion
to draw a prize/a lottery/a raffle
money wrapped in red as a gift/bonus payment/kickback/bribe
